# PED::GET_PED_COMBAT_RANGE

## Summary
Gets the current range that the ped will engage the targets during combat

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **COMBAT_RANGE**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
See SET_PED_COMBAT_RANGE
